title: Implement real-time story collaboration features
description: Enable multiple users to collaborate on user stories simultaneously with live editing, comments, and change tracking to improve team productivity
iWant: real-time collaboration on user stories with my teammates
soThat: we can work together efficiently and avoid conflicts when editing stories
acceptanceCriteria: Multiple users can edit the same story simultaneously
Changes are synchronized in real-time across all connected users
Comment system allows team discussion on specific story elements
Change history tracks all modifications with timestamps and authors
Conflict resolution handles simultaneous edits gracefully
